title: Hayden, Mozart, Stravinsky - Greater New Haven Youth Ensemble
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Poster for the Greater New Haven Youth Ensemble's free concert.  In large white and pink letters spaced diagonally across the green background, Hayden, Symphony no. 82, Mozart symphony no. 25, Stravinsky Suites nos. 1 and 2
name: Poster
